languages.text: "Что? Но я всего лишь..." {n}Дознаватель смущенно умолкает.{/n} "Я действительно всего лишь хотел провести с тобой время. Полагаю, моя формулировка была выбрана несколько неверно".

traits.locale_text: "Что? Но я всего лишь..." {n}Дознаватель смущенно умолкает.{/n} "Я действительно всего лишь хотел провести с тобой время. Полагаю, моя формулировка была выбрана несколько неверно".

languages.text: "What? But I meant..." {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I truly only wanted to spend time with you. I suppose I could have phrased my invitation differently."
languages.original_text: "Что? Но я всего лишь..." {n}Дознаватель смущенно умолкает.{/n} "Я действительно всего лишь хотел провести с тобой время. Полагаю, моя формулировка была выбрана несколько неверно".

traits.locale_text: "What? But I meant..." {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I truly only wanted to spend time with you. I suppose I could have phrased my invitation differently."
"What? But I meant..." {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I truly only wanted to spend time with you. I suppose I could have phrased my invitation differently."
"What? But I meant..." {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I truly only wanted to spend time with you. I suppose I could have phrased my invitation differently."
"What? But I meant..." {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I truly only wanted to spend time with you. I suppose I could have phrased my invitation differently."

languages.text: “什么？可我的意思是……”{n}这位审讯官尴尬地沉默了片刻。{/n}“我真的只想和你共度一段美好时光。我猜，我当时或许应该换一种用词来邀请你才是。”
languages.original_text: "What? But I meant..." {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I truly only wanted to spend time with you. I suppose I could have phrased my invitation differently."

traits.locale_text: “什么？可我的意思是……”{n}这位审讯官尴尬地沉默了片刻。{/n}“我真的只想和你共度一段美好时光。我猜，我当时或许应该换一种用词来邀请你才是。”

languages.text: «¿Qué? Pero si...». {n}El interrogador guarda un avergonzado silencio.{/n} «De verdad que solo quería pasar tiempo con usted. Supongo que podría haberme expresado mejor en la invitación».
languages.original_text: "What? But I meant..." {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I truly only wanted to spend time with you. I suppose I could have phrased my invitation differently."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué? Pero si...». {n}El interrogador guarda un avergonzado silencio.{/n} «De verdad que solo quería pasar tiempo con usted. Supongo que podría haberme expresado mejor en la invitación».

languages.text: 「何？だが俺は…」{n}インテロゲイターは恥ずかしそうに沈黙する。{/n}「俺は本当にあなたと一緒に過ごしたかっただけなんだ。もっと違う言い方でお誘いすればよかっただろうか」
languages.original_text: "What? But I meant..." {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I truly only wanted to spend time with you. I suppose I could have phrased my invitation differently."

traits.locale_text: 「何？だが俺は…」{n}インテロゲイターは恥ずかしそうに沈黙する。{/n}「俺は本当にあなたと一緒に過ごしたかっただけなんだ。もっと違う言い方でお誘いすればよかっただろうか」

languages.text: « Quoi ? Mais je voulais... » {n}L'interrogateur marque une pause, l'air embarrassé.{/n} « Tout ce que je voulais, c'était passer du temps avec vous. J'imagine que j'aurais pu formuler mon invitation autrement. »
languages.original_text: "What? But I meant..." {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I truly only wanted to spend time with you. I suppose I could have phrased my invitation differently."

traits.locale_text: « Quoi ? Mais je voulais... » {n}L'interrogateur marque une pause, l'air embarrassé.{/n} « Tout ce que je voulais, c'était passer du temps avec vous. J'imagine que j'aurais pu formuler mon invitation autrement. »

languages.text: "Was? Aber ich meinte ..." {n}Der Interrogator verfällt in betretenes Schweigen.{/n} "Ich wollte wirklich nur Zeit mit Euch verbringen. Ich hätte meine Einladung wohl anders formulieren sollen."
languages.original_text: "What? But I meant..." {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I truly only wanted to spend time with you. I suppose I could have phrased my invitation differently."

traits.locale_text: "Was? Aber ich meinte ..." {n}Der Interrogator verfällt in betretenes Schweigen.{/n} "Ich wollte wirklich nur Zeit mit Euch verbringen. Ich hätte meine Einladung wohl anders formulieren sollen."

languages.text: "Ne? Fakat benim kastettiğim..." {n}Sorgucu, utanç içinde sessizliğe bürünüyor.{/n} "Tek istediğim, gerçekten seninle vakit geçirmekti. Sanırım davetiyemi biraz daha farklı bir şekilde kelimelere dökebilirdim."
languages.original_text: "What? But I meant..." {n}The Interrogator lapses into an embarrassed silence.{/n} "I truly only wanted to spend time with you. I suppose I could have phrased my invitation differently."
